statements: SELECT * FROM convergence_behavior;
SELECT algorithm_name, convergence_rate FROM convergence_behavior;
SELECT optimization_goal, algorithm_name FROM convergence_behavior ORDER BY optimization_goal DESC;
SELECT * FROM convergence_behavior WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT algorithm_name, convergence_rate FROM convergence_behavior WHERE optimization_goal = 'minimize';
SELECT * FROM convergence_behavior WHERE optimization_goal = 'minimize';
SELECT experiment_id, algorithm_name FROM convergence_behavior WHERE convergence_rate >= 0.5 ORDER BY experiment_id DESC;
SELECT optimization_goal, AVG(convergence_rate) AS avg_convergence_rate FROM convergence_behavior GROUP BY optimization_goal;
SELECT algorithm_name, COUNT(*) AS num_experiments FROM convergence_behavior GROUP BY algorithm_name HAVING num_experiments > 2;
SELECT * FROM convergence_behavior ORDER BY algorithm_name, optimization_goal DESC;
SELECT * FROM quantum_machine_learning_optimization WHERE optimization_id = 1;
SELECT optimization_algorithm, convergence_rate FROM quantum_machine_learning_optimization;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM convergence_history;
SELECT iteration_number, loss_value FROM convergence_history WHERE optimization_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM quantum_machine_learning_optimization WHERE optimization_id = 3 ORDER BY convergence_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM quantum_machine_learning_optimization WHERE optimization_algorithm = 'Gradient Descent';
SELECT optimization_id, optimization_algorithm FROM quantum_machine_learning_optimization WHERE optimization_id > 100 ORDER BY optimization_id DESC;
SELECT optimization_algorithm, MAX(convergence_rate) AS max_rate FROM quantum_machine_learning_optimization GROUP BY optimization_algorithm;
SELECT * FROM convergence_history WHERE convergence_status = true ORDER BY iteration_number ASC;

SELECT ch.history_id, ch.iteration_number, qmlo.optimization_algorithm FROM convergence_history ch JOIN quantum_machine_learning_optimization qmlo ON ch.optimization_id = qmlo.optimization_id WHERE ch.loss_value < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM ConvergenceBehavior;
SELECT experiment_id, algorithm_name, iterations FROM ConvergenceBehavior ORDER BY iterations DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, algorithm_name, iterations FROM ConvergenceBehavior WHERE accuracy > 0.9;
SELECT optimization_id, quantum_unit, optimization_type FROM QuantumOptimization;
SELECT history_id, objective_value, convergence_status FROM OptimizationHistory WHERE objective_value < 10000;
SELECT * FROM ConvergenceBehavior WHERE iterations > 100;
SELECT algorithm_name, convergence_rate FROM ConvergenceBehavior WHERE accuracy IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM QuantumOptimization WHERE convergence_threshold > 0.5 ORDER BY optimization_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(objective_value) AS max_objective_value, AVG(convergence_threshold) AS avg_threshold FROM OptimizationHistory;
SELECT experiment_id, COUNT(history_id) AS num_iterations FROM OptimizationHistory GROUP BY experiment_id HAVING COUNT(history_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM QuantumOptimizationParameters;
SELECT optimization_id, algorithm_name FROM QuantumOptimizationParameters;
SELECT iteration, loss FROM QuantumOptimizationData ORDER BY iteration DESC;
SELECT status, message FROM QuantumOptimizationStatus WHERE optimization_id = 1;
SELECT optimization_id, final_loss, convergence FROM QuantumOptimizationResults WHERE final_loss < 0.05;
SELECT * FROM QuantumOptimizationParameters;
SELECT optimization_id, algorithm_name, learning_rate, convergence_threshold FROM QuantumOptimizationParameters WHERE learning_rate > 0.01;
SELECT data_id, iteration, loss FROM QuantumOptimizationData ORDER BY iteration DESC;
SELECT optimization_id, final_loss, convergence FROM QuantumOptimizationResults WHERE final_loss < 0.5;
SELECT status_id, optimization_id, status FROM QuantumOptimizationStatus WHERE optimization_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM OptimizationAlgorithm
SELECT algorithm_name, convergence_speed FROM OptimizationAlgorithm
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM QuantumOptimizationMetrics
SELECT computer_name, qubit_count, manufacturer FROM QuantumComputers
SELECT data_id, input_data, output_data FROM TrainingData
SELECT * FROM QuantumOptimizationMetrics WHERE metric_id = 1;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM QuantumOptimizationMetrics WHERE optimization_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM OptimizationAlgorithm ORDER BY convergence_speed DESC, max_iterations ASC;
SELECT algorithm_name, optimization_type, max_iterations FROM OptimizationAlgorithm WHERE convergence_speed > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM OptimizationHistory WHERE optimization_loss < 0.05 ORDER BY iteration_number DESC;
